definition: the left-radical form of Kangxi radical 145, 衣[yi1]
half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half

sentences.english: The ulcerations worsen and the woman eventually underwent a loop sigmoid colostomy.
sentences.chinese: 溃疡恶化，最终该女患经受了乙状结肠袢式造口术。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical value of rehabilitation nursing after substitute popliteal vein valve operation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨腘静脉肌袢代瓣术后患者的康复护理。

sentences.english: Objective To modify transverse colon loop ostomy operation.
sentences.chinese: 目的改进横结肠袢式造瘘的术式。

sentences.english: Full-grain leather upper with studded harness strap and pull tab.
sentences.chinese: 附带镶嵌装饰钉的鞍部皮带和拉袢的全粒面牛皮靴面。

sentences.english: The shape of external laryngeal branch is looped, but not as traditional linear.
sentences.chinese: 喉上神经外支呈袢状，而非传统的干形。

definition: creases/folds or pleats in a garment
ilium/outermost bone of the pelvic girdle/Taiwan pr. [ka4]
(literary) overlapping part of Chinese gown/lapel/sleeping mat
